scripts.start: npx firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore,storage "fvm flutter run -d chrome"
scripts.test:functions: npm --prefix functions run lint && npx firebase emulators:exec --only auth,firestore,storage "npm --prefix functions test"
scripts.test:ui: npx firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore,storage "echo fvm flutter test"
scripts.test: npm run test:functions && npm run test:ui
